wrongNetwork: You are on the wrong network
installWeb3MobileBrowser: Please visit us from a web3-enabled mobile browser such as Trust Wallet or Coinbase Wallet.
installMetamask: Please visit us after installing Metamask on Chrome or Brave.
betaWarning: This project is in beta. Use at your own risk.
searchOrPaste: Search Token Name, Symbol, or Address
unknownError: Oops! An unknown error occurred. Please refresh the page, or visit from another browser or device.
enterValueCont: Enter a {{ missingCurrencyValue }} value to continue.
noRecipient: Enter a wallet address to send to.
invalidRecipient: Please enter a valid wallet address recipient.
mustBeETH: One of the input must be ETH.
enterCurrencyOrLabelCont: Enter a {{ inputCurrency }} or {{ label }} value to continue.
totalSupplyIs: Current total supply of liquidity tokens is
youAreSettingExRate: You are setting the initial exchange rate to
totalSupplyIs0: Current total supply of liquidity tokens is 0.
tokenWorth: At current exchange rate, each pool token is worth
firstLiquidity: You are the first person to add liquidity!
firstLiquidityTips: Price will be determined by the ratio of two tokens you added. once you are good with the price, please click 'supply' and confirm.
initialExchangeRate: The initial exchange rate will be set based on your deposits. Please make sure that your ETH and {{ label }} deposits have the same fiat value.
enterLabelCont: Enter a {{ label }} value to continue.
label: Label
name: Name
enterTokenCont: Enter a token address to continue
brokenToken: The selected token is not compatible with Uniswap V1. Adding liquidity will result in locked funds.
toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
slogan: -An Open, Safe, Fair DEX Ecosystem with High Composability built on Emerald, the EVM Compatible ParaTime on Oasis
handingTip: YuzuSwap takes 0.3% trading fee, 80% of the fee will be put into the buyback pool to buyback YUZU and burn automatically, the rest 20% will go to a community vault.
limitTip: The Limit Order tradingfee is 0.2% and is paid to the protocol.
limitRiskNotice: Please note that the limited order function is not yet audited, use it at your own risk.
limitReciveHint: You are guaranteed to receive no less than this amount, otherwise the transaction will not be triggered.
limitPriceHint: The price shown is a net price taken account of slippage and fees.
orderTip: The effective duration of a limit order is 90 days. Orders that expire without being fulfilled will not be executed, but can be canceled.
sellTip: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
affectTip: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
liquidityProviderRewardsMemo: Liquidity Providers are rewarded with YUZU token when they stake their LPT of certain pools.They can unstake it at any time.
dontSeeLiquidity: Don't see a pool you joined?
dayReturnTip: number of YUZU token rewarded for yesterday/daily volume*0.3%
myCurrentTradeVolumeTip: Volume of Unclaimed rewards, return to 0 after claim
myCurrentRewardTip: Unclaimed Rewards, return to 0 after claim
pledgeTip: Unclaimed rewards will be automatically claimed
cancelPledgeTip: Unclaimed rewards will be automatically claimed
addLiquidityTips: You will be rewarded with YUZU by staking the liquidity provider token in selected pools. Providing liquidity in other pools will not be rewarded.
doublegetRewardHint: The number of non-YUZU rewards you see is estimated, it is influenced by others' stake/unstake activities, so it may decrease. But if you withdraw the rewards now, the number of rewards you see will be the number you receive.
unwrapExtRewardHint: wLUNA is an interim token pegged with LUNA, you can always unwrap it to get LUNA at 1:1 ratio, we highly suggest that you should unwrap LUNA once you receive the rewards. Warning: unwrapping wLUNA less than 0.000001 will get 0 LUNA.
xyuzuhint: Stake xYUZU in Single Token Staking to mine both YUZU and ROSE at the same time.
xyuzuhintQ: The same amount of xYUZU as minted will be burnt to redeem YUZU at the redemption.
unstakeRules: When unstake countdown returns to zero, you can unstake xYUZU to redeem YUZU. But if you donot redeem in time, there will be a cool-down period before you can actually withdraw YUZU.
unstakeRulesQ: For instance, one locks YUZU for 90 days to mint xYUZU, he waited till the 100th day to redeem, then he will have to wait till the 110th day to be able to withdraw YUZU. The cool-down period will be no longer than the lock-up period.
